creditline: Gift of James A. Bergquist, Boston, in honor of Rachel McGarry
inscription:
In plate, lower left: AB. Flamen. fe.
In plate, lower center: Alusa. L'Alose.
In plate, lower right: cum privil Regis
markings: Verso: collector's stamp of Rudolph Philip Goldschmidt (Lugt 2926)
portfolio: Diverses espèces de poissons de mer, second partie
text: Albert Flamen was a prolific printmaker active in Paris. Over six hundred prints are credited to him, and most were didactic in nature. This study of shad was part of a series on saltwater fish. He also did series on freshwater fish and birds.
title: Alausa. L'Alose, from Diverses espèces de poissons de mer, second partie
